name: Plastic Critter
description:
A small development of a simple infinite scroller game (Flappy Bird inspired)

Players need to survive by avoiding obstacles along the way

Clicking or tapping on the screen will help the Plastic Critter to stay afloat

Players are given 3 lives each round

Getting hit by a net or falling  out of bounds will reduce the health by 1

Getting hit by a hook will instantly kill the player

Collect the little marine animals such as Crabs and Turtles to  raise your points
